Distribution.Description: Linux Users Association Pardus Corporate 2 Contrib Repository
Linux Kullanıcıları Derneği Pardus Kurumsal 2 Katkı Deposu

Source.Name: gpsbabel
Source.Description: GPSBabel converts waypoints, tracks, and routes between popular GPS receivers and mapping programs. It also has powerful manipulation tools for such data.
GPSBabel durak noktaları, izler ve rotaların yaygın GPS alıcılar ve haritalama programları arasında biçem dönüşümlerini yapar. Bu verileri işlemek için güçlü araçlara da sahiptir.

Update.Comment: Update doc path for 2009, remove non-existant doc.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: merkaartor
Source.Description: This is a Qt4-based editor for the OpenStreetMap with features such as map view near-WYSIWYG, style editor, transparent display of map features, support for handling seperate highways, import NMEA-files, etc.

Açık Sokak Haritası (OpenStreetMap) için bir Qt4 tabanlı harita düzenleyicisi olan Merkaartor'un stil düzenleyici, harita özelliklerinin saydam gösterilmesi, bağımsız otoyol desteği, NMEA dosyalarının içe aktarılmabilesi, WYSIWYG tarzı düzenleme gibi birçok özelliği bulunuyor.

Update.Comment: Update tarball sha1sum (includes non-trivial fix), add translations.xml, remove optional dependency, add qt-webkit dependency since it's a seperate package now.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Switch to API 0.6, remove support for API 0.5 * Add a Features dock displaying the features in the current viewport * Alternative way of drawing GPX tracks * Support for proxy authentication * Ability to create a junction between to crossing roads, polygons of any number of sides, house numbers "Karlsruhe" style * Ability to rotate roads/areas * Spatial indexing of features for faster display with large downloaded areas * Support for multiple image layers * Support for multi-selection of layers; allow to show/hide or readonly several layers at once * Drag and drop re-ordering of layers * Plugin-based background layers * Ability to choose Qt style * Discardable dialog/messageboxes * Fixed a bugging graphical corruption on Intel chipsets when the "Show downloaded area" was selected. * Fixed problem with "center" + "center and zoom" from the properties dock. * Fixed nodes fetched by relations are incomplete and not completed by "download more". * Other minor tweaks and bug fixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Fix in Name property inspector causes AV * Remove English language warning * Proper handling of the "Don't connect GPX nodes..." preference when set to 0. * Fit the style editor in 1024x600 resolution * Reflect in dirty dock the fact that multiple objects were changed together * Added threaded browser-based background image grabbing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Support for KML import * Support for ESRI Shapefile import (albeit not enough tested ;-) * A new background image layer with a basic SHP map of the world * Improved Geotagging pictures support * A "Style" dock * Readonly layers * A native SVG renderer to export your custom maps * A custom QT style * A "one-mouse-button" interaction preference * Many other features and bugfixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to stable release, use official logo, change menu category.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: tuxcards
Source.Description: With TuxCards it is possible to create as many different entries or notes as you wish. Everytime you add a new one and you think your new entry belongs to the same topic as notes you already have, then you may decide to group them and to create a kind of "folder" where you store them all together.
Tuxcards ile istediğiniz sayıda not yazmak mümkün. Tutulan notlar hiyerarşik olarak oluşturulabilen çeşitli "klasör"lerde gruplanabiliyor.

Update.Comment: Version bump to QT4 port, add icon tag. Remove strict deps, update doc path for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: freecol
Source.Description: Game starts in 1492 and the object of the game is to colonize America , build a powerful nation, declare your independence and survive the attack of the King's forces.
Oyun 1492'de başlıyor. Oyunun amacı Amerika'yı kolonileştirmek, güçlü bir ulus inşa etmek, bağımsızlığınızı ilan etmek ve kralın kuvvetlerinin saldırısına karşı ayakta kalmak.

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable: * AI breeds horses more effectively * AI uses pioneers more effectively * AI distributes workers more effectively * AI creates and assigns soldiers more effectively * AI constructs more advanced buildings * Building graphics (taken from NewCol and SweCol project) * New images for forests and beaches * Redesigned panels and dialogs using MigLayout * The colony panel, colopedia panel and report panel now remember their size * More useful for small displays (1024x600) * Map shows national borders * Stockades no longer prevent abandoning a colony * Together with a custom house, de Witt circumvents boycotts * The Treaty of Utrecht
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Bump to new alpha of new development version for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Bump to alpha of new development version for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : Many bugfixes, translation updates.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to new stable : * Ability to define gameplay mechanics, change the game rules * Units now slide between tiles while moving. * New terrain graphics. * New music and sound effects. * Named regions and nicer placement of native settlements. * New nations added: Portuguese, Swedish, Danish and Russian * Games with up to eight European players are now supported. * A lot more new features and bugfixes.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to new alpha for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to new alpha for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest svn for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to new alpha for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: ltris
Source.Description: LTris as a tetris clone which means you have a bowl with blocks falling down. By rotating and moving the blocks you try to assemble whole lines which then disappear. LTris has three modes for this: Classic is the classical one where you play until the bowl becomes filled, Figures resets the bowl contents to a new figure for each level and adds suddenly appearing tiles and lines later on and Multiplayer where up to three players either controlled by human or CPU compete and send completed lines to each other.

LTris bildiğiniz Tetris oyunudur. Yukarıdan aşağıya düşen blokları döndürerek ve hareket etirerek sıraları boşluk bırakmadan doldurma temeline dayanır, dolan sıralar silinir. LTris'in 3 seçeneği vardır: "Klasik", kutunun tamamı doluncaya kadar oynanır, "Şekiller" her bölümde kutunun şeklini değiştirir ve "ÇokOyunculu" birden fazla oyuncuyla oynanandır (ve istenen oyuncular bilgisayar tarafından oynanabilir).

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Add icon tag, mark localedata correctly. * Missing include, bad memset calls and typos in english localization fixed. * Range of horizontal delay for block movement increased to allow less sensitive setting.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Translation updates * Highscore charts are now language independent * 'Block shadow' (to help aiming) is now enabled by default.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Remove strict deps, update doc path, change library linking seq (thanks to Onur) for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: connectagram
Source.Description: Connectagram is a word unscrambling game. The board consists of several scrambled words that are joined together. You can choose the length of the words, the amount of words, and the pattern that the words are arranged in. The game provides a hint option for times when you are stuck, and features an online word lookup that fetches the definitions of each word from www.dict.org.

Connectagram bir sözcük tahmin etme oyunudur. Oyun tahtasında, birbiriyle birleştirilmiş ama harflerinin yerleri değiştirilmiş sözcükler bulunmaktadır. Sözcüklerin uzunluklarını, sayısını ve tahtadaki düzenleniş biçimlerini seçebiliyorsunuz. Takıldığınızda isterseniz ipucu alabiliyorsunuz. Bunun yanında Connectagram, kullanılan sözcüklerin anlamlarını www.dict.org adresinden bakıp, önünüze getirebiliyor.

Source.Name: fish-fillets-data
Source.Description: Contains Fish Fillets NG data files.
Fish Fillets NG oyununun veri dosyalarını içerir.

Source.Name: pytraffic
Source.Description: PyTraffic is a computer version of the board puzzle Rush Hour. The goal is to remove the red car out of the grid through the slot on the right. To do this you have to slide the other cars out of the way.
PyTraffic "Kalabalık Saatler" (Rush Hour) bulmacasının bilgisayara uyarlanmışıdır. Amaç, kırmızı aracı haritadan çıkartabilmektir. Bunun için diğer araçları yolundan çekmeniz gerekir.

Source.Name: pathological
Source.Summary: Clone of the game "Logical" by Rainbow Arts
Source.Description: Path-o-Logical is a clone of the game "Logical" by Rainbow Arts. To solve a level, fill each wheel with four marbles of matching color. Various board elements such as teleporters, switches, filters, etc., make the game interesting and challenging. New levels can be created using your favorite text editor.

Rainbow Arts'ın Logical oyununun benzeri. Işınlama noktaları, düğmeler, filtreler ve benzeri bir çok aracı kullanarak her tekerleği eş renk toplarla doldurun. Üstelik herhangi bir düzmetin editörü kullanarak kendinize yeni seviyeler yapabilirsiniz.

Update.Comment: Update doc path for 2009, add icon tag.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Source.Name: fish-fillets
Source.Description: Next generation of Fish Fillets Underwater puzzle game. Find your way out! You can toggle fullscreen with the F11 key.
Yeni nesil Fish Fillets zeka oyunu. Küçük balıkların doğru yolu bulmasına yardım edin. Çıkış acaba nerede... Oyunu tam ekran yapmak için F11 tuşunu kullanabilirsiniz.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Fixed undefined behavior in the last levels where outgoing objects could be stopped by an obstacle. * Fixed strange background colors on the F10 and F1 screens.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Used sound frequency 44100 to prevent crackles. * Embedded intro video. * Enhanced graphics. * Faster undo, redo. * Updated translations. * 4 new levels. * Add support for translated images. * Prevented music restart on undo. * Fixed checking for solvable room before undo saving. * Fixed checking for second dead fish. * Remove strict deps and update doc path for 2009, update summary, add copyright.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Gcc-4.3 patch and lua patch added
Update.Name: Murat Şenel

Update.Comment: Version bump for extra levels, undo support and bugfixes
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump to fix table iterations for lua
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: tuxtype
Source.Description: "Tux Typing" is an educational typing tutor for children. It features several different types of gameplay, at a variety of difficulty levels.
"Tux Typing" çocuklar için eğitsel bir daktilo öğretmenidir. Çeşitli tipte ve zorluk düzeyinde oyunlar içerir.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Word list editor * Much better background images and new music for the "fish cascade" * Significantly expanded word lists, phrase list and lessons * New translations
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * i18n and utf8 fixes * Cleanup of some scripting menu issues * Text drawing, background scaling and optimization improvements * Add translations.xml, fix summary * Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Fixed crashing bug in fullscreen fish cascade game * Safety checks for null pointers, array bounds violations, etc. * Tweaks to startup screen * Lessons menu now has the same look and feel of the other menus
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump. Many new features, many bugfixes over a period of four years (too many to list).
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Added a desktop file for kmenu
Update.Name: Michael Austin

Source.Name: tuxmath
Source.Description: "Tux, of Math Command" ("TuxMath," for short) is an educational arcade game where you have to solve math problems, starring Tux, the Linux mascot!
Başrolde Linux maskotu Tux'ın olduğu, çocuklara özel eğitim amaçlı, matematik problemlerinin çözüldüğü bir oyun

Update.Comment: Add icon tag, change menu category (and use internal desktop file)
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Text drawing, background scaling and optimization improvements * More strings have i18n support * Fix "Math Command Training Academy" lesson reset problem * 3 new menu icons and clean-up cloud icon * Check for indeterminate questions and to use the "comprehensive" method whenever multiple-operand questions are not needed. * Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump, many new features, including i18n support and Turkish translation.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to svn r75 for cool new features.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Add a patch for makefile to fix installation
Update.Name: Murat Şenel

Source.Name: maniadrive
Source.Description: Arcade car game on acrobatic tracks, with a quick and nervous gameplay (tracks almost never exceed one minute), and featuring a network mode.
Akrobasi pistlerinde ister yerel, ister ağ ve internet üzerinden yarış oyunu. Hızlı düşünmeli ve oynamalısınız, çünkü bölümlerin neredeyse hiçbiri bir dakikadan uzun sürmez.

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009, add icon tag.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Source.Name: blobAndConquer
Source.Summary: Mission and objective based 3D action game
Source.Description: Episode II of Blob Wars, a 3D action game featuring a variety of different weaponry and multiple objectives.
Çeşitli görev ve farklı silahların yer aldığı 3 boyutlu aksiyon oyunu. Blob Wars'un 2. bölümü.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Fixes a bug in the save game system * All cutscenes are always played before a boss battle * Some typos were also fixed.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * i18n support and Polish translations * Allows players better control over optional motion blur * Motion blur settings is now automatically disabled when outside of the actual game * Fix bugs in cheat options, font addition and sound/volume settings
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Stable update. This update fixes some issues with loading missions and when changing or restarting a level when holding special items, such as grappling hooks.
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Update.Comment: Remove unnecessary import, srctag variable and strict dependencies, add missing libsdl and mesa dependencies.
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Source.Name: njam
Source.Summary: Network multiplayer or singleplayer Pacman-like game
Ağ üzerinden oynanabilen Pac-man türevi bir oyun
Source.Description: Njam is a full-featured cross-platform pacman-like game written in C++ using SDL library.
Njam, çokluplatform destekleyen, C++ dilinde ve SDL kütüphanelerini kullanarak hazırlanmış pac-man tarzı bir oyundur.

Update.Comment: Add icon tag, change icon type to png.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: gnujump
Source.Description: GNUjump is a clone of the simple yet addictive game Xjump, adding new features like multiplaying, unlimited FPS, smooth floor falling, themable graphics etc.
SDLjump basit bir temele dayanan (zıplamak) ama bağımlılık yapan Xjump oyununun SDL türevidir. Xjump'a nazaran çok oyunculu olma gibi önemli ek özellikler getirir.

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Drop Turkish translation for now since GnuJump's i18n support is buggy and causes the game to crash on some systems (#8839).
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add missing dependency; change homepage archive, address and packager.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: Ri-li
Source.Description: Drive the toy to find all the coaches to finish the levels.
Oyuncak tahta motoru sürerek bölümlerdeki objelerin hepsini toplayın.

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant

Update.Comment: Add gcc43 patch and remove gentoo directory

Update.Comment: Version bump for new translations and mouse support

Update.Comment: Version bump, Turkish translation by Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: frozen-bubble
Source.Description: Frozen Bubble is a Puzzle Bubble clone written in Perl with network support; full-featured, colorful animated penguin eyecandy, 100 levels of 1p game, hours and hours of 2p game, a level-editor, 3 professional quality 20-channel music tracks, 15 stereo sound effects, 7 unique graphical transition effects.

Frozen Bubble Puzzle Bubble oyununun ağ desteği içeren benzeridir. Cıvıl cıvıl görüntüler, tek oyuncu için 100 seviye, ağ üzerinden karşılıklı oynama imkânı, seviye editörü, 20 kanallı ve birbirinden kaliteli 3 şarkı, 15 stereo ses efekti, 7 grafik geçiş efekti içerir.

Update.Comment: Change icon path for the package-manager icon tag to work.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009, add more docs.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to new stable. Changes since release 15 : * more options in LAN/NET games (continue game when players leave; disable player targetting) * fixed abort during a multiplayer game with a player in lowest graphics mode * much faster Internet servers listing (parallel discovery) * add ability to record and replay games; also add ability to save frames from records * geolocalized nicks in server lounge
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest git for testing the upcoming 2.2.0 release
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest git for testing the upcoming 2.2.0 release
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Remove empty directory and perl dependency
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix LAN game problems with long nicks
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Version bump, fb now support network. Yay!
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Add sdl-gfx and sdl-sound dep (thanks to Faik)
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Make it work + add desktop file
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: lbreakout2
Source.Description: The polished successor to LBreakout offers you a new challenge in more than 50 levels with loads of new bonuses (goldshower, joker, explosive balls, bonus magnet, ...), maluses (chaos, darkness, weak balls, malus magnet, ...) and special bricks (growing bricks, explosive bricks, regenerative bricks, indestructible bricks, chaotic bricks). And if you're through with all the levels you can create complete new levelsets with the integrated easy-to-use level editor or challenge other people via LAN or Internet in either deathmatch or normal levelsets.

LBreakout'un geliştirilmiş hali 50'den fazla seviye, yeni bonuslar (altın yağmuru, joker, patlatan toplar, bonus mıknatısı, ...), kötü şeyler (kaos, karanlık, zayıf toplar, kötü şey mıknatısı, ...) ve özel tuğlalar (büyüyen tuğlalar, patlayan tuğlalar, yenilenen tuğlalar, yok edilemeyen tuğlalar, kaotik tuğlalar, ...) içerir. Ve tüm bölümleri bitirirseniz kullanımı kolay seviye editörüyle yeni seviye paketleri yapabilir veya başlarıyla yerel ağda veya internette oynayabilirsiniz.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * All sounds now have sample rate 22050 to prevent poor on-the-fly conversion of cheap sound cards. * Fixed a bug that cut the first few entries from the level set list in the menu (so you have more to play now). * Some english typos have been fixed. * The quick help now has text with proper transparency.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Swearing disabled by default * Translation updates * Added new levelsets
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009; add icon tag, add a latin1 Turkish translation.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Removed extra levelsets, too much space, very little to gain
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: blobwars
Source.Summary: Platform game about a blob and his quest to rescue MIAs from an alien invader
Bir damlayı canlandıracağınız eğlenceli bir platform oyunu
Source.Description: In Blob Wars:Metal Blob Solid, you take on the role of a fearless Blob agent, Bob. Bob's mission is to infiltrate the various enemy bases around the Blobs' homeworld and rescue as many MIAs as possible. But standing in his way are many vicious aliens, other Blobs who have been assimilated and the evil alien leader, Galdov.
Vatanını seven bir damla olarak, uzaylı istilacılardan asker arkadaşlarınızı kurtarın. Oldukça eğlenceli ve zorlu bir platform oyunu

Update.Comment: Version bump : - Fix issues with random number generation (meaning that some weapon powerups stopped appearing, as well as fixing the keyboard controls on the map screen) - Fix alpha blending issues. - Add icon tag.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : Several bugfixes including font, locale and gameplay. Translation updates.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: qcomicbook
Source.Summary: An image viewer specifically designed to handle comic books
Source.Description: QComicBook is a viewer for comic book archives (cbz, cbr, cbt). QComicBook has specific features like page preview, thumbnails view, bookmarks, manga mode for easing comicbook reading.

QComicBook cbz, cbr, cbt biçimindeki çizgi roman arşivlerini görüntülemek için kullanılır. Sayfa ön görünümü, sayfa döşeme, yer imi, mangalar için sayfa sırasını ters gösterme gibi çizgi roman okumayı kolaylaştırıcı özellikleri bulunuyor.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * implemented true continuous viewing mode. 'Continuous scrolling' option moved to 'View' menu. * removed 'Forward two pages in two pages mode' option. * new and improved 'System Information' dialog. * fixed splash screen showing an put a new splash screen. * fixed bug in subdirectories handling that resulted in missing images * fixed bug with p7zip archiver detection that could result in crash when opening .7z archives * added option to embed page numbers on displayed page * properly clear empty areas when displaying 2 pages of different size * fixed freezing when unpacking some archives (in particular zip) * fixed crash when opening archives via 'Recently opened' menu * thumbnails are now saved with sha1-hashed file names * add icon tag
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: easytag
Source.Description: EasyTAG is a utility for viewing and editing tags for MP3, MP2, MP4/AAC, FLAC, Ogg Vorbis, MusePack and Monkey's Audio files.
EasyTAG MP3, MP2, MP4/AAC, FLAC, Ogg Vorbis, Musepack ve Monkey's Audio ses dosyalarının etiketlerinin görüntülenebileceği ve düzenlenebileceği bir yazılımdır.

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Drop id3lib in favor of libid3tag.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump including Turkish locale fix for vorbis.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: rpl
Source.Description: rpl is a text replacement utility. It will replace strings with new strings in multiple text files. It can work recursively over directories and supports limiting the search to specific file suffixes.

rpl bir metin değiştirme aracıdır. Birden fazla metin dosyasında eşlenen metinleri yenileri ile değiştirecektir. Alt dizinleri özyinelemeli olarak tarayabilir ve arama/değiştirme işlemini sadece belirli uzantılı dosyalara uygulayabilir.

Update.Comment: Version bump, only fixes compilation issues.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: fdupes
Source.Description: FDupes is a program for identifying or deleting duplicate files residing within specified directories. Such files are found by comparing file sizes and MD5 signatures, followed by a byte-by-byte comparison.

FDupes, belirlenen dizinlerde eş dosyaları tespit etmek ve/ya silmek için kullanılan bir yazılımdır. Dosyaların eş olmasını öncelikle dosya boyutu, daha sonra MD5 imzası ve son olarak da bayt karşılaştırılmasının sonucuna göre belirler.

Source.Name: torrentinfo
Source.Description: TorrentInfo is a simple command-line tool that parses .torrent files and provides a summary of their contents.
TorrentInfo .torrent dosyalarını inceleyerek, içeriklerine ilişkin özet bilgisi veren basit bir komut satırı aracıdır.
